pages.text: $(l)Category:$() Raptor $(br)$(l)Tamable:$() False $(br)$(l)Aggression:$() Aggressive $(br)$(l)Type:$() Small-Pack Hunter $(br)$(l)Found In:$() Forests

The Megaraptor is a pack-hunting, medium-sized carnivore. Upon finding a suitable hunting target, it'll crouch down and stalk it for up to a few seconds before breaking into a chase and gaining Speed and Strength for a short amount of time. Megaraptors use their large, front claws to slice into prey, giving them the Bleeding effect.
